App Tab

The Challenge

App Tab is a mobile app that can be used in a restaurant to view the menu, place an order, and pay the bill. It allows restaurants to serve more customers with less wait staff and streamlines the ordering process. I was tasked with creating the experience for the app and designing and MVP product.

My role: experience and design.

The Process

First detailed wireframes of the core screens.

High fidelity user flow.

The Results
